title: Mongryongjeon (2024)
description:
Description :
        Lee Mong-ryong', a Joseon secret royal inspector with beautiful flowers and a brilliant mind'. The first area that was dispatched with confidence according to the king's command was... Namwon is famous for its pervert Tamgwanori Byeonsato. Mongryong, a novice secret royal inspector, is in danger of being forced to submit a request, and at that time, Mongryong catches the eye of a real stranger. If possible, wear a dahong skirt. If he's going to be hugged by a man anyway, I think he'll get better, so I grab the stranger. "Responsible! You made me like this."
